resources.string: ArZu is centered on making travel simple and has been designed to let you look for cheap flights or complete your flight booking in just a few clicks. The booking experience is seamless and fast with our features like Expressway – which allows for easy checkout, Shortlist – this lets you compare multiple itineraries across dates, Fare alert – here we inform you of price drops or hikes, and even EMI options for expensive air tickets. Our round-the-clock customer service ensures all your queries and concerns are addressed efficiently and resolved.
